comments.body: Do you think we may as well add an error message field as well?

I was wondering the same thing. I got inspiration from `FetchRequest`. There is no error message there so I figure I would not add it for consistency.

I'll add it if we think that every request should have `ThrottleTimeMs`, `ErrorCode` and `ErrorMessage` at the top level.

I don't have a strong opinion. It would be nice to refactor the protocols to have a standard set of top level fields. Since we don't have a strong reason for the field now, maybe we can leave it for the future.
